GettingStarted.name: Getting Started
GettingStarted.content:
## Installing Raw Events

> This requires Klasa Master and Discord.js Master

To get the functionality of the plugin you will need to first install it and then include it in your Client.

The installation can be done using github and soon NPM.

> I assume you know how to open a command prompt in a folder where you want to install this. Please don't prove me wrong.

```sh
npm install --save @kcp/raw-events
```

### Using the plugin

In your main file which contains

```js
const { Client } = require('klasa');
```

you need to put

```js
const { Client } = require('klasa');

Client.use(require('@kcp/raw-events'));
```

and then you can continue your bot as normal.

### Notes

I suggest that you console log each planned raw event as the data might sometimes look different than what discord.js formats in the normal events.

## Further Reading:

- {@tutorial CreatingRawEvents}

classes.name: RawEventClient
classes.description: The client for handling everything. See {@tutorial GettingStarted} for more information how to get started using this class.

params.name: config
params.description: The config to pass to the new client

classes.name: RawEvent
classes.description:
Base class for all Klasa Raw Events. See {@tutorial CreatingRawEvents} for more information how to use this class
to build custom raw events.

params.name: file
params.description: The path from the pieces folder to the event file

params.name: core
params.description: If the piece is in the core directory or not

props.name: fullPacket
props.description: If the raw event should get the full packet object

methods.name: toJSON
methods.description: Defines the JSON.stringify behavior of this extendable.

classes.name: RawEventStore
classes.description: Stores all the Raw Events that are part of the plugin

props.name: pieceDefaults
props.description: Overrides the defaults for all pieces

props.name: event
props.description: The event that should be listened to

props.name: fullPacket
props.description: Whether the file should recieve the full packet
